requirements.name: Array Index
requirements.requirement: Return correct item at the given index of the array.
requirements.inverse: Incorrect item returned at the given index.

requirements.name: Replace Item
requirements.requirement: Replace item at the given index with 0.
requirements.inverse: Item at the given index not replaced with 0.

requirements.name: Duplicate Strings
requirements.requirement: Return true if vector contains duplicate strings, otherwise return false.

requirements.name: Vector Element Access
requirements.requirement: Return correct item at the given index of the vector using the at() method.
requirements.inverse: Incorrect item returned at the given index using the at() method.

requirements.name: Vector Creation
requirements.requirement: Return vector with 5 integers added using the push_back() method.

requirements.name: String Vector Order
requirements.requirement: Return vector with 4 strings added in order without using push_back().
requirements.inverse: Incorrect string vector creation in order.

requirements.name: Char Array to Integer Vector
requirements.requirement: Return integer vector converted from given char array.
requirements.inverse: Incorrect conversion of char array to integer vector.

requirements.name: Change Capital Letters
requirements.requirement: Change array so that every other letter is lowercase.
requirements.inverse: Incorrect change of capital letters to lowercase.

requirements.name: Combine Integer Vectors
requirements.requirement: Return a 2D vector from 3 given integer vectors.
requirements.inverse: Incorrect combination of integer vectors into a 2D vector.
